markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Dwarven Daisy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=594)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Quest #5: The Dragon Who Stole Evoking Day](/Sources.aspx?ID=27) pg. 14</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A dwarven daisy is a string of dozens of firecrackers that create tiny, loud explosions. The string ends with a short, wrapped fuse. Pulling off the wrapping in a quick motion lights the fuse and is done as part of the action to Strike. A dwarven daisy deals the listed fire damage and splash damage. A dwarven daisy also has a chance to [dazzle](/Conditions.aspx?ID=7) its target. A creature struck by a dwarven daisy must succeed at a Fortitude save or become dazzled for 1 round.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Limited"
>
Dwarven Daisy (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Quest #5: The Dragon Who Stole Evoking Day](/Sources.aspx?ID=27) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 6 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The firework deals 1d6 fire damage and 1 fire splash damage. The DC is 16.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Limited"
>
Dwarven Daisy (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Quest #5: The Dragon Who Stole Evoking Day](/Sources.aspx?ID=27) pg. 14</row>

**Price** 18 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The firework deals 2d6 fire damage and 2 fire splash damage. The DC is 18.
name: Dwarven Daisy (Lesser)
